quotes.text: My nana used to say today is a great day for a great day.
quotes.author:
John Nolan
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: Get that woman out of your house.
quotes.author:
Wade Grey
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: I thought Charlie was a guy.
quotes.author:
Angela Lopez
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: I love Rookie Day. It’s Christmas and the Purge in one.
quotes.author:
Timothy Bradford
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: Don’t make me pull the "buried alive" card.
quotes.author:
Lucy Chen
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: The only way to show you I'm a good cop is to show you I'm a good cop.
quotes.author:
Angela Lopez
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: I would shut that down so fast.
quotes.author:
Celina Juarez
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: In my mind, I'm hitting you right now.
quotes.author:
Lucy Chen
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: Nothing like a traumatic event to make you realize that your life is empty.
quotes.author:
Pam
From "The Rookie"

quotes.text: I just found out this morning that Bailey has been dead more than once.
quotes.author:
John Nolan
From "The Rookie"
